arts.ttl: Liverpool 2-0 Bologna: Player ratings as Reds earn hard-fought win
arts.sum: Having started somewhat slowly last time out at Wolves, Liverpool looked far sharper from the off here, with a Ryan Gravenberch ball across the box almost turned home by both Dominik Szoboszlai and Luis Diaz moments after kick-off. A Trent Alexander-Arnold giveaway then resulted in Kacper Urbanski forcing Alisson Becker into a smart save before Arne Slot's team began to reassert themselves just before half-time.

arts.ttl: 'Special': Ryan Gravenberch blown away by £35m Liverpool teammate after 2-0 Bologna win
arts.sum: Ryan Gravenberch continued his fine start to the season as he played a pivotal role in Liverpool’s 2-0 UEFA Champions League win against Bologna. Goals...

arts.ttl: 'We couldn't do anything': Bologna boss admits Liverpool star was impossible to stop in UCL clash
arts.sum: The Liverpool ace was brilliant again...

arts.ttl: Arne Slot defends Darwin Nunez and explains what's 'too early' to say about Liverpool striker
arts.sum: Arne Slot talked Darwin Nunez after the Liverpool striker endured an at times frustrating night in the 2-0 Champions League win at home to Bologna

arts.ttl: Vincenzo Italiano Proud of Bologna Performance Against Liverpool
arts.sum: Bologna slipped to a 2-0 defeat to Liverpool in only their second UEFA Champions League outing in over 60 years last night. However, head coach Vincenzo Italiano was proud of his team, insisting they left Merseyside with 'our heads held high.' The post Vincenzo Italiano Proud of Bologna Performance Against Liverpool appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah sets new Champions League record with stunning strike in Liverpool's victory over Bologna at Anfield
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah set a new Champions League record as he scored an excellent goal in Liverpool's 2-0 win at home to Bologna.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot makes Liverpool history with feat even Jurgen Klopp couldn't manage - but still believes Reds can improve after easing past Bologna
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ANFIELD: Arne Slot became the first Liverpool manager in history to win eight of his first nine games, but says his team must improve if they are to kick on this season.

arts.ttl: Orsolini: ‘Legendary night for Bologna in Liverpool’
arts.sum: Riccardo Orsolini insists it remains ‘a legendary night for Bologna’ even if they lost 2-0...

arts.ttl: Slot: ‘Bologna made it difficult for Liverpool, similar to Atalanta’
arts.sum: Arne Slot insists that he was not ‘delighted’ with Liverpool’s performance, despite recording a 2-0...

arts.ttl: Bologna’s Riccardo Orsolini reacts to Liverpool loss: “Legendary evening”
arts.sum: Serie A side Bologna lost to Liverpool in the Champions League at Anfield but they put on a brave effort against a much-superior outfit. The Rossoblu conceded a goal each…
